30#include <sys/cdefs.h>
31#include <sys/types.h>
32#include <sys/conf.h>
33#include <sys/cpuvar.h>
34#include <sys/errno.h>
35#include <sys/param.h>
36#include <sys/kernel.h>
37#include <sys/misc.h>
38#include <sys/module.h>
39#include <sys/mutex.h>
40
41cpu_core_t cpu_core[MAXCPUS];
42solaris_cpu_t solaris_cpu[MAXCPUS];
43
44/*
45 * OpenSolaris subsystem initialisation.
46 */
47void
48opensolaris_init(void *dummy)
49{
50 int i;
51
52 /*
53 * "Enable" all CPUs even though they may not exist just so
54 * that the asserts work. On FreeBSD, if a CPU exists, it is
55 * enabled.
56 */
57 for (i = 0; i < MAXCPUS; i++) {
58 solaris_cpu[i].cpuid = i;
59 solaris_cpu[i].cpu_flags &= CPU_ENABLE;
60 }
61
62}
63
64void
65opensolaris_fini(void *dummy)
66{
67}
68
